builder.bulkCloseTickets: Close all active tickets in this server

deleteArchivedTicket.descrp: Delete a specific archived ticket by user
deleteArchivedTicket.user: The user whose archived ticket to delete

builder.deleteAllArchivedTickets: DELETE ALL archived tickets in this server

deleteArchivedApplication.descrp: Delete a specific archived application by user
deleteArchivedApplication.user: The user whose archived application to delete

builder.deleteAllArchivedApplications: Delete ALL archived applications in this server

migrate.cmdDescrp: [ADMIN ONLY] Migrate and update existing data
migrate.ticketTags: Retroactively apply forum tags to existing archived tickets
migrate.applicationTags: Retroactively apply forum tags to existing archived applications

deleteArchivedTicket.successWithPost: Deleted archived ticket and forum post for {user}
deleteArchivedTicket.successNoPost: Deleted archived ticket for {user} (forum post not found)

deleteArchivedApplication.successWithPost: Deleted archived application and forum post for {user}
deleteArchivedApplication.successNoPost: Deleted archived application for {user} (forum post not found)
